attributes.action: Claim back the £100k plus expenses given to Nick Clegg by the cabinet office
attributes.background: Article in The Sunday Times 24th July stating that Nick Clegg is being handed tax payer's money by the Cabinet office - to fund his expenses, despite him no longer holding any official post in HM Govt - other than him being an ordinary MP.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the rules on the public duty cost allowance to be changed. Without a change to those rules, it is not clear on what basis money could be claimed back.
